donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: The project will build bridges between local government and young people by utilizing the potential of social media platforms and mobile phone technologies.  UNDP will support municipalities in using social media tools to make local government more attractive, approachable and open for youth.

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: Through the use of modern communication tools, such as social media, web2.0 and mobile phone technologies, this project will harness the creativity, innovativeness and collaborative attitude of citizens interested in achieving a political change regardless of ethnicity, gender or physical disabilities.

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: The ability of the judiciary to fight corruption internally and externally is increased

project_descr: The project Support to Anti-Corruption Efforts in Kosovo is expected to have a positive impact on reducing the level of corruption in Kosovo
project_title: Support to Anti-Corruption Efforts in Kosovo
